Protocols/TerminalControlling.html#/s:4a.name: write(_:)
Protocols/TerminalControlling.html#/s:4a.abstract: Writes the given string in the terminal.

Protocols/TerminalControlling.html#/s:4a.name: clearLine()
Protocols/TerminalControlling.html#/s:4a.abstract: Clears the current line and moves the cursor to the beginning of the line

Protocols/KeyReading.html#/s:4acho10KeyR.name: subscribe(subscriber:)
Protocols/KeyReading.html#/s:4acho10KeyR.abstract: Subscribes to key events. It blocks the thread until an exit or enter event is delivered.

Protocols/Formatting.html#/s:4acho10Form.name: format(question:options:)
Protocols/Formatting.html#/s:4acho10Form.abstract: Formats the question and the options and returns and array

Protocols/AchoProtocol.html#/s:4acho12Ac.name: ask(question:options:)
Protocols/AchoProtocol.html#/s:4acho12Ac.abstract: Prints the question and the options in the terminal and subscribes to key events

Protocols/AchoProtocol.html.name: AchoProtocol
Protocols/AchoProtocol.html.abstract: Protocol that defines an interface to ask the user to choose an option from a given list.

Protocols/Formatting.html.name: Formatting
Protocols/Formatting.html.abstract: Protocol that defines an interface for formatting the prompt output.

Protocols/KeyReading.html.name: KeyReading
Protocols/KeyReading.html.abstract: Protocol that defines the interface for subscribing

Protocols/TerminalControlling.html.name: TerminalControlling
Protocols/TerminalControlling.html.abstract: Protocol that defines the interface to interact with the terminal.

Extensions/TerminalController.html#/s:5B.name: write(_:)
Extensions/TerminalController.html#/s:5B.abstract: Writes the given string in the terminal.

Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: hexDescription
Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Returns the hex representation of the data

Classes/State.html#/s:4acho5StateC2upyyF.name: up()
Classes/State.html#/s:4acho5StateC2upyyF.abstract: Move the selected line one line up.

Classes/State.html#/s:4acho5StateC4downy.name: down()
Classes/State.html#/s:4acho5StateC4downy.abstract: Move the selected line one line down.

Classes/State.html#/s:4acho5StateC6outpu.name: output()
Classes/State.html#/s:4acho5StateC6outpu.abstract: Returns the terminal output for the given state.

Classes/Acho.html#/s:4acho4AchoC3ask8que.name: ask(question:options:)
Classes/Acho.html#/s:4acho4AchoC3ask8que.abstract: Prints the question and the options in the terminal and subscribes to key events

Classes/State.html.name: State
Classes/State.html.abstract: It represents the state of the prompt.
